interpretation:
The "sponge" card represents a need to absorb and cleanse oneself of negative energy or situations. This card suggests that it is time to rid oneself of any lingering emotional or mental debris. Just as a sponge soaks up water and grime, this card encourages the querent to soak up any negativity in their life and release it. It's time to take control of one's own well-being and remove anything that no longer serves them. 

Associated keywords: cleansing, purification, renewal, release, absorb, remove, discard, start fresh, rejuvenation. 

Overall, the "sponge" card serves as a reminder to take care of oneself and prioritize one's own emotional and mental health. It's time to cleanse oneself of anything that has been holding one back and start anew.
